nodes.documentation: @title A contract to hold escrowed SNX and free them at given schedules.
nodes.name: RewardEscrow

nodes.documentation: @notice set the synthetix contract address as we need to transfer SNX when the user vests
nodes.name: setSynthetix

nodes.documentation:
@notice set the FeePool contract as it is the only authority to be able to call
appendVestingEntry with the onlyFeePool modifer
nodes.name: setFeePool

nodes.documentation: @notice A simple alias to totalEscrowedAccountBalance: provides ERC20 balance integration.
nodes.name: balanceOf

typeDescriptions.typeString: mapping(address => uint256[2] storage ref[] storage ref)

nodes.documentation: @notice The number of vesting dates in an account's schedule.
nodes.name: numVestingEntries

typeDescriptions.typeString: mapping(address => uint256[2] storage ref[] storage ref)

nodes.documentation:
@notice Get a particular schedule entry for an account.
@return A pair of uints: (timestamp, synthetix quantity).
nodes.name: getVestingScheduleEntry

nodes.documentation: @notice Get the time at which a given schedule entry will vest.
nodes.name: getVestingTime

nodes.documentation: @notice Get the quantity of SNX associated with a given schedule entry.
nodes.name: getVestingQuantity

nodes.documentation: @notice Obtain the index of the next schedule entry that will vest for a given user.
nodes.name: getNextVestingIndex

nodes.documentation:
@notice Obtain the next schedule entry that will vest for a given user.
@return A pair of uints: (timestamp, synthetix quantity).
nodes.name: getNextVestingEntry

nodes.documentation: @notice Obtain the time at which the next schedule entry will vest for a given user.
nodes.name: getNextVestingTime

nodes.documentation: @notice Obtain the quantity which the next schedule entry will vest for a given user.
nodes.name: getNextVestingQuantity

nodes.documentation: @notice return the full vesting schedule entries vest for a given user.
nodes.name: checkAccountSchedule

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Must be enough balance in the contract to provide for the vesting entry"

arguments.value: Must be enough balance in the contract to provide for the vesting entry

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Must be enough balance in the contract to provide for the vesting entry"

typeDescriptions.typeString: mapping(address => uint256[2] storage ref[] storage ref)
literal_string "Cannot add new vested entries earlier than the last one"

arguments.value: Cannot add new vested entries earlier than the last one

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Cannot add new vested entries earlier than the last one"

typeDescriptions.typeString: mapping(address => uint256[2] storage ref[] storage ref)

nodes.name: appendVestingEntry

typeDescriptions.typeString: mapping(address => uint256[2] storage ref[] storage ref)

nodes.documentation: @notice Allow a user to withdraw any SNX in their schedule that have vested.
nodes.name: vest

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Only the FeePool contracts can perform this action"

arguments.value: Only the FeePool contracts can perform this action

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Only the FeePool contracts can perform this action"
